keyMoments.title: Luffy and Sanji Work Together
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Sanji demonstrate teamwork as Sanji helps launch Luffy toward Noah to stop it from destroying Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hat Pirates' coordinated effort to save Fish-Man Island despite the dangerous circumstances.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Battles Hody Underwater
keyMoments.description: Luffy faces off against Hody Jones in a deadly underwater battle to protect Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's willingness to risk his life despite severe disadvantages to protect others.

keyMoments.title: Hody Jones Attacks Luffy
keyMoments.description: Captain Hody Jones confronts Luffy underwater, using his fish-man advantages to dominate the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the New Fish-Man Pirates' commitment to destroying Fish-Man Island and killing anyone who opposes them.

keyMoments.title: Hody Betrays Vander Decken
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones stabs his former ally Vander Decken IX, betraying their alliance to further his goal of destroying Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that the New Fish-Man Pirates' captain values destruction above all alliances and loyalty.
